snippet: In five previous Australian Open wins, Novak Djokovic had never felt so much love....
lead_paragraph: In five previous Australian Open wins, Novak Djokovic had never felt so much love.

headline.print_headline: Djokovic Wins 6th Australian Title; Murray Loses 5th Final
